places.name: Nonos
places.address: 112 Judd St, London WC1H 9NT, United Kingdom

places.name: Flat Iron Kings Cross
places.address: 47-51 Caledonian Rd, London N1 9BU, United Kingdom

places.name: Dishoom King's Cross
places.address: 5 Stable St, London N1C 4AB, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Dishoom King’s Cross is one of the most beautiful and well-designed restaurants in London. The vintage Bombay theme, warm lighting, and detailed interiors create an unforgettable dining atmosphere. The food is consistent

places.name: Granger & Co. King's Cross
places.address: Unit 1, The Stanley building, 7 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4AG, United Kingdom

places.name: Caravan King's Cross
places.address: 1 Granary Square, London N1C 4AA, United Kingdom

places.name: Morty & Bob's
places.address: 49, Coal Drops Yard, London N1C 4DQ, United Kingdom

places.name: Coal Office Restaurant
places.address: 2 Bagley Walk, London N1C 4PQ, United Kingdom

places.name: Harry's King's Cross
places.address: Harry's Kings Cross, 3 King's Blvd, London N1C 4BU, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Had such an amazing time here. The staff were so lovely, welcoming and prompt with service. We sat outside and the atmosphere was incredible. We ordered the truffle arancini which was divine along with a side of flat bre

places.name: Granary Square Brasserie
places.address: 1 Granary Square, London N1C 4AA, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: The weekday set lunch is excellent; delicious and great value at £24 nett. I had the calamari to start and the grilled seabream as the main; both were beautifully prepared. The interior décor is impressive, making it a

places.name: The Lighterman
places.address: 3 Granary Square, London N1C 4BH, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: I was surprised how good the food was (I tried three appetisers, Mama Mia). Amazing food yet amazing view! Please choose the window seat. You will know what I am saying!

places.name: German Gymnasium
places.address: 1 King's Blvd, London N1C 4BU, United Kingdom

places.name: Drake & Morgan at King's Cross
places.address: 6 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4AG, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: We haven’t been down to London for a while so were unaware of Drake and Morgan until we were looking for somewhere to have a coffee. It’s a lovely venue, comfortable, spacious and with stylish decor. We chose to sit insi

places.name: Hoppers Kings Cross
places.address: Unit 3, 4 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4AG, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: I had a nice meal at hoppers near King’s Cross. The food was tasty and the restaurant was nicely decorated. I felt for the price we paid we could have gotten bigger portions. The staff were friendly but were not as avail

places.name: Spagnoletti
places.address: 27 Euston Rd., London NW1 2SD, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: The first time I went to the restaurant, I felt welcomed, the set up was great and the staff were really friendly. I tried the mushrooms mezzaluna with celeriac broth, loved it but the broth was a bit salty. The staff we

places.name: Camino
places.address: 290 - 292 Pentonville Rd, London N1 9NR, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Visiting Camino felt like stepping into a sunlit corner of Andalusia. The space is cosy yet elegant, perfect for family meals, quiet dinners, or lively evenings. Shreyas, our waiter, welcomed our toddler with warmth whil

places.name: Barrafina Coal Drops Yard
places.address: 27 Coal Drops Yard, London N1C 4AB, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Visited recently and had a great experience overall. The food and service were both excellent — every dish we ordered was delicious. Portion sizes are on the smaller side, but that’s expected with modern tapas-style dini

places.name: Mare Street Market Kings Cross
places.address: 2 Lewis Cubitt Walk, London N1C 4DY, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: i love coming here - the sitting era is so spacious and the atmosphere is great. the waiters are nice but sometimes the food takes a while to come which is okay as it's quite busy! the food is a bit pricey but really re

places.name: RAILS Restaurant & Little Bar
places.address: Pancras Rd, London N1C 4TB, United Kingdom

places.name: BAO Kings Cross
places.address: Unit 2, 4 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4DP, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: First time going to BAO (King’s Cross branch) and it didn’t disappoint! I went a couple of days after my birthdag, and the staff made it very special. We got the beef steak rice, egg yolk dish - delicious and perfectly c

places.name: Mildreds Kings Cross
places.address: 200 Pentonville Rd, London N1 9JP, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Great place! Had the brunch burrito and my partner the green tofu salad both delicious. We shared a tiramisu for dessert. Definitely recommend! Service was super friendly and efficient too.

news.title: When England Tried to Tame Ireland’s Unruliest Province
news.description: “I had rather labour with my hands in the plantation of Ulster, than dance or play in that of Virginia.” –Sir Arthur Chichester to King James, 1610 * As part of his vision of a unified “Britain,” James was determined

news.title: Topological turning points across the human lifespan
news.description: Researchers discovered five phases of brain rewiring across the lifespan. The eras of childhood, adolescence, adulthood, early aging, and late aging each have characteristic rewiring of structural connections across the whole brain.

news.title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae giant and star of landmark film ‘The Harder They Come,’ dead at 81
news.description: His family posted a message that he died from a “seizure followed by pneumonia.”

news.title: ABX London to feature Laurent Mekies and spotlight power shift across motorsport

news.title: ABX London to feature Laurent Mekies and spotlight power shift across motorsports
news.description: The Autosport Business Exchange heads to London just ahead of the 2026 racing season

news.title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae giant and star of landmark Jamaican film ‘The Harder They Come,’ dead at 81
news.description: Cliff was nominated for seven Grammys and won twice for best reggae album.

news.title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae legend and star of ‘The Harder They Come, dies at 81
news.description: Cliff was nominated for seven Grammys and won twice for best reggae album. Many still know his music by "Many Rivers to Cross."

news.title: Jimmy Cliff Death: 'The Harder They Come' Reggae Superstar Dies at 81
news.description: Jimmy Cliff, the reggae superstar credited with bringing the music to the world with his film 'The Harder They Come' has died at 81.

news.title: Reggae pioneer Jimmy Cliff dies at 81
news.description: Jimmy Cliff, the charismatic reggae pioneer and actor who preached defiance, joy and endurance in such classics as “Many Rivers to Cross,” “You Can Get it If You Really Want” and “Vietnam” and starred in the landmark movie “The Harder They Come,” has died at …
